<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>GRC: Vendor Risk Management added two new fields "Third Party (sn_vrm_vendor_third_party)" and "Fourth Party (sn_vrm_vendor_fourth_party)" to distinguish a vendor from a fourth-party vendor. This fix script is to update all the existing vendors to the relationship of "Third-party".</description>
        <name>Update vendor relationship</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('core_company');
gr.addActiveQuery();
gr.addQuery("vendor", true);
gr.setValue('sn_vrm_vendor_third_party', true);
gr.query();
gr.updateMultiple();

var rules = new GlideRecord('sn_vdr_risk_asmt_tpss_rule');
rules.addQuery('apply_to_vendors', 'vendor=true^EQ');
rules.setValue('apply_to_vendors', 'vendor=true^sn_vrm_vendor_third_party=true^EQ');
rules.query();
rules.updateMultiple();]]></script>
